TopicTitle: Mashinky - New Game for the Rail Fans

Articles.Content:
I've noticed that we have some rail fans here, so I'd just like to inform you guys that there is a new game out. It's in Early Access on Steam, costs €23.

Anyway, it's somewhat similar to Transport Tycoon with more modern graphics. The vibe seems to be the same.

Having spent countless hours in OTTD, I think I might like this one too.

Downloading as we speak.
